# Investments

Investments

## INVEST
Have an investment

Levels:
+ 1=Yes
+ 0=No

## INVEST_OWN
Have an investment in own business

Levels:
+ 1=Yes
+ 0=No

## INVEST_OTHER
Have an investment in other places: counts respondents who invest in other people's businesses, assets, or buy shares of foreign or local enterprises, or government bonds. 

Levels:
+ 1=Yes
+ 0=No

## INVEST_INFORMAL
Invest in informal institution: counts respondents who ever invested money using a self help group or cooperative that doesn't provide a bank account and they are not a member of.


Levels:
+ 1=Yes
+ 0=No

## INVEST_INSURANCE
Have an investment or insurance: counts respondents who invest in thier own business or in other places and also have insurance.

Levels:
+ 1=Yes
+ 0=No
